name: Tales of acilain demo
description:
this  is a game about a boy. some where in the middle ages. who is taken from his home by a mysterious dark figure. He has his arm cut off and is thrown into a well. barly surviving a ghost finds him and bring him back hopeing he can set her soul and all the other fictims free as well. With your new found power you must solve puzzles and deafeat great enemies to take down the dark beast for good. 

Please note this is only what i have done so far there are some glitches im cutting out please let me know if you find any i have alot to do yet adding text and story animations stay tuned for updates. Oh and if you make it to the first shadow boss the sword deflects his arrows back at him thats how you kill him. 3 out of 5 worlds and dungeons completed. Lost caverns, acilain forest, forest dungeon, great desert, ice city, ice palace. To come the fairy forest, fairy church, cursed island, finnal dungeon. There are many secret powers to descover can you find them all. Hearts, magic ups and much more!

Update finished ice palace, fixed pause menu
